src:
Zenit imao šansu, pa se raspao... CSKA je CSKA
Armejci prelomili u poslednjoj četvrtini - 87:70

01 Nov 2019


Za otvaranje današnjeg programa u Evroligi imali smo sudar ruskih ekipa Zenita i CSKA. Dobra utakmica, na kraju rešena u poslednjoj četvrtini boljom igrom Armejaca dok se tim Đoana Plaze raspao u tim momentima, pa je čak i sam trener dobio isključenje. CSKA je pogodio tri važne trojke u poslednjih 10 minuta i tu prelomio meč - 70:87.

Najefikasniji kod domaćina bio je Gustavo Ajon sa 20 poena, Vil Tomas je dodao 14, a Ostin Holins 13 poena. Kod pobedničkog sastava istakli su se Majk Džejms sa 16 poena, Johanes Vojtman sa 14 i Darun Hilijard i Nikita Kurbanov sa po 13 datih poena.
Zenit je ovaj meč dočekao u dobrom raspoloženju posle slavlja u gostima protiv Žalgirisa, dok je CSKA poražen od Olimpijakosa i večeras se tim Dimitrisa Itudisa trudio da izvadi fleke. I to je uspeo.
Očekivano smo večeras u Sankt Peterburgu gledali tesnu utakmicu, a CSKA je kao favorit bolje počeo utakmicu i već posle 10 minuta imao dvocifrenu prednost. Tako je ostalo i do poluvremena posle dobre igre Kurbanova, Vojtmana i Džejmsa, ali se u trećoj deonici sve zakomplikovalo.
Na krilima Ajona, Tomasa i Holinsa Zenit je uspeo da se vrati u igru tokom treće deonice i da dosta zakomplikuje situaciju pa se i u poslednju deonicu praktično ušlo u egal rezultatu. CSKA je i dalje imao blagu prednost, ali je tim Đoana Plaze dobio šansu za preokret.
Ipak, kada se lomilo CSKA je ubacio u veću brzinu i preko Hilijarda i Džejmsa je trojkama stigao do dvocifrene prednosti koja je Armejcima olakšala posao.
Ako je Zenit i imao neke nade, onda ih je izgubio kada je Johanes Vojtman prostrelio trojku na tri minuta do kraja za prednost gostiju od 80:67. Posle toga Zenit nije imao šanse da se vrati.
CSKA je dobio za bodove, za navijače i dokaz da je ipak on glavni u Rusiji. Na kraju je i Đoan Plaza isključen što je samo uobličilo očajnu poslednju četvrtinu domaće ekipe.

EVROLIGA - 6. KOLO


Četvrtak

Crvena zvezda - Himki 90:78/Simanić 18 - Šved 14/
Panatinaikos - Anadolu Efes 86:70/Rajs 18 - Larkin 28/

Petak

Zenit - CSKA 70:87/Ajon 20 - Džejms 16/

NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
Zenit had a chance, so it fell apart ... CSKA is CSKA
The Armenians broke in the last quarter - 87:70

01 Nov 2019


To open today's Euroleague program we had a collision of Russian teams Zenit and CSKA. A good game, ultimately resolved in the last quarter by a better game of the Armeans as Giovanni Plaza's team fell apart in those moments, and even the coach himself got shut down. CSKA have hit three important threes in the last 10 minutes and there break the match - 70:87.

The most efficient host was Gustavo Ajon with 20 points, Will Thomas added 14 and Austin Hollins 13 points. The winning team featured Mike James with 16 points, Johannes Wojtman with 14 and Darun Hilliard and Nikita Kurbanov with 13 points each.
Zenit welcomed this match in good spirits after celebrating away against Zalgiris, while CSKA were defeated by Olympiakos and tonight Dimitris Itudis team struggled to get the stains out. And he did it.
As expected, we were watching a close game tonight in St. Petersburg, with CSKA as the favorite to start the game better and already after a 10 minute double digit advantage. That remained until halftime after a good play by Kurban, Wojtman and James, but in the third section things got complicated.
On the wings of Aion, Thomas and Hollins, Zenit managed to get back into the game during the third section and complicate the situation a lot, so the last section practically entered the egal result. CSKA still had a slight lead, but Giovanni Plaza's team got a chance to reverse.
However, when the break CSKA kicked in at a faster rate and through Hilliard and James, the triple reached a double-digit advantage that made it easier for the Armeyans to do the job.
If Zenit had any hopes, then he lost them when Johannes Vojtman fired a three-pointer for three minutes to end for the visitors 80:67. After that, Zenit had no chance of returning.
CSKA won for points, for fans and proof that it is still the main one in Russia. Eventually, Joanne Plaza was ruled out, which only shaped the home team's desperate final quarter.

EUROLEAGUE - DAY 6


Thursday

Red Star - Khimki 90: 78 / Simanic 18 - Swede 14 /
Panathinaikos - Anadolu Ephesus 86: 70 / Rice 18 - Larkin 28 /

Friday

Zenit - CSKA 70: 87 / Ayon 20 - James 16 /
